articles.author: Sharon LaFraniere, Noah Weiland, Rebecca Robbins
articles.title: Biden and Drug Makers Look to Speed Coronavirus Vaccine Deliveries - The New York Times
articles.description: Moderna will ask federal regulators to increase the amount of coronavirus vaccine it can put in each vial by as much as 50 percent, potentially bolstering availability quickly.
articles.content: The introduction of pharmacies will be the start of a new stage in the nations vaccination campaign. So far the drive has been centered in hospitals, other health care facilities and big sites like s… [+1998 chars]

articles.author: Sara Ashley O'Brien, CNN Business
articles.title: Uber is betting $1.1 billion on alcohol deliveries - CNN
articles.description: Uber's future used to be self-driving cars. Now it's delivering alcohol.
